criterion.given: I am on a mobile device
criterion.then: it: Displays correctly on mobile, Has touch-friendly interactions, Loads quickly (< 1s for logging), Works in portrait and landscape, Is usable on tablets

criterion.given: I am on a mobile device

it: Utilizes tablet screen space effectively, Has appropriate layout for larger screens, Maintains touch-friendly interactions, Works in both orientations

criterion.given: I switch between mobile and desktop

doc.title: Epic Breakdown
doc.snippet: As a user on mobile, I want all features to work well on mobile, So that I can use the platform on any device. Comprehensive responsive design, touch interaction optimization, mobile performance, tablet support.

doc.title: Architecture Document
doc.snippet: Design mobile-first, then enhance for larger screens. Use Tailwind responsive utilities. Ensure touch targets minimum 44px × 44px.

artifact.reason: Tailwind CSS configuration. Ensure breakpoints configured correctly for responsive design (sm, md, lg, xl).
Root layout. Ensure viewport meta tag is set correctly for mobile responsiveness.
Navigation component. Add mobile menu (hamburger menu) for mobile responsiveness.

constraints.constraint: Mobile-first: Design mobile-first, then enhance for larger screens per architecture.md
Tailwind CSS: Use Tailwind responsive utilities (sm:, md:, lg:, xl:) for responsive design
Touch targets: Ensure all interactive elements are at least 44px × 44px for touch
Performance: Mobile performance is critical - ensure pages load quickly (< 1s for logging)
Viewport meta: Ensure viewport meta tag is set correctly in app/layout.tsx
Cross-device testing: Test on iOS, Android, tablets, various browsers

interface.name: Responsive Design Pattern
interface.signature: Use Tailwind responsive utilities: - Mobile (default): Base styles - Tablet (md:): md:grid-cols-2, md:text-lg - Desktop (lg:): lg:grid-cols-3, lg:text-xl - Large Desktop (xl:): xl:max-w-7xl

tests.standards: Testing approach: Mobile viewport tests, touch interaction tests, performance tests, cross-device testing. Focus on responsive design correctness, touch target sizes, performance on mobile, and user experience. Test edge cases: various screen sizes, portrait/landscape orientations, different browsers, slow network. Manual testing on actual mobile devices and tablets.
tests.locations: Mobile viewport tests: Test on mobile viewport sizes (375px, 414px, 768px, 1024px) Touch target tests: Verify all interactive elements meet 44px × 44px minimum Performance tests: Measure page load times on mobile Cross-device tests: Test on iOS, Android, tablets No formal test framework currently configured - focus on manual testing and code review

test.steps: 1. Use any feature on mobile device. 2. Verify displays correctly. 3. Verify touch-friendly interactions. 4. Verify loads quickly (< 1s for logging). 5. Test portrait and landscape. 6. Test on tablets.

1. View dashboard on mobile. 2. Verify fits screen width. 3. Verify readable text sizes. 4. Verify appropriately sized buttons and inputs. 5. Verify proper spacing and layout. 6. Verify easy to navigate.
1. Use platform on tablet. 2. Verify utilizes screen space effectively. 3. Verify appropriate layout for larger screens. 4. Verify touch-friendly interactions. 5. Test both orientations.
1. Switch between mobile and desktop. 2. Verify layout adapts appropriately. 3. Verify all features remain functional. 4. Verify no content cut off or hidden.
